item.title: Imagine Dragons - Bad Liar - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele.
Chords Used: D, Bm, G, A, F#, Asus4
Key of D, lowered a half step from the original in Eb.
As performed by Imagine Dragons.
Tutorial Video (GCEA): Go to https://youtu.be/cTdAiw4Ox-M
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is based on Chordette for Education (Chordette is available from ukefarm.com, but the baritone font I am using is not yet available from ukefarm).
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Imagine Dragons - Bad Liar - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele.
Chords Used: F, Dm, Bb, C, A, Csus4
Key of F, raised a whole step from the original in Eb.
As performed by Imagine Dragons.
Want to see the tutorial video for this song? Go to https://youtu.be/cTdAiw4Ox-M
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Imagine Dragons - Whatever It Takes
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Whatever It Takes on the ukulele by Imagine Dragons. The chords used are C F G Em Am D.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Imagine Dragons - Whatever It Takes - Key of F
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for education purposes ONLY.
All rights belong to Dan Reynolds, Wayne Sermon, Ben McKee, Daniel Platzman and Joel Little.
CHORDS USED: Am, G, Em, F, C, D
The song in this video is 1 half step lower than the original track, for the purpose of making the chords easier to play.
Strum On!!
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fredoniaukuleleclub
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fredoniaukuleleclub/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel

item.title: Imagine Dragons - Natural - Key of Em
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Em (Raised a whole step from the original key).
As performed by Imagine Dragons.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Imagine Dragons - Thunder - Key of C
Imagine Dragons - On Top Of The World - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play On Top Of The World on the ukulele by Imagine Dragons. The chords used are C F G Dm Am.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Imagine Dragons - Demons - Key of D
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for educational purposes ONLY.
Chords used: D, A, Bm, G
All rights belong to Dan Reynolds, Alex da Kid, Daniel Wayne Sermon, Daniel Platzman, Ben McKee and Josh Mosser.
